<<<<<<< HEAD
The male of the flock, or A sermon preached at St. Pauls, before the right honourable, the Lord Mayor, and the right vvorshipfull, the aldermen of the city of London, Septemb: the 9th: 1655. By Benjamin Agas, minister of Cheneyes in Bucks. Agas, Benjamin.
[6], 31, [1] p.
Printed by A:N. for Henry Eversden, at the Greyhound in Pauls Church-yard., London : 1655.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "Nou: 30". Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======

Printed by A:N. for Henry Eversden, at the Greyhound in Pauls Church-yard., London : 1655.
